newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine June inflation seen about 0.1 percent.
newsitem.headline: Argentine June inflation seen about 0.1 percent.

text.p: Argentine consumer price inflation was about 0.1 percent in June, according to the average forecast by analysts surveyed by Reuters.
The forecasts ranged from 0.0 and 0.2 percent, with all those surveyed agreeing that the deflation of the preceding three months came to a halt in June.
Prices fell by 0.1 percent in May, as they did in June 1996.
